skins.shipDescription: Specialized Bulin Custom MKIII. Can be used to Limit Break all Ultra Rare ships.
skins.selfIntroduction: A wrench, a drill, and a hammer... Wait a sec! Is there some kind of pattern here, bulin?!
skins.acquisition: Bulin~! Aren't you amazed? Standing before you is the legendary secret unlockable character of the Bulin family, none other than me! Rejoice, for you have been blessed with supremely good RNG, bulin!
skins.login: Commander, it's hammer time! You'll get super strong, bulin!
skins.details: If ever in doubt, just tell me to bonk it with my hammer, bulin!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sleepy, bulin? Then I'll charge you right up! I just need to plug in my... What? That doesn't work, bulin?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You might get a surprise when you collect 1 of each bulin! But I dunno what the surprise would even be!
skins.secretaryIdle3: My Kitty Kabam Hammer goes glimmer-glammer, sparkely sparkle, whooshy-kablam! Check it out, bulin!
skins.secretaryTouch: This bad boy is my "raison d'etre"! Be careful with it, or you'll get hurt, bulin!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh nooooooo! I'm gonna overload, bulin!
